field.caption: What kinds of speakers would you most like to see give presentations?

field.caption: How many JUG meetings have you attended in the past?

field.caption: How often would you like to have meetings?

field.caption: What day of the week best fits your schedule?

field.caption: Assuming a 2 hour meeting, what time best fits your schedule?

field.name: earliest
field.caption: What is the earliest time you can make possibly it?

field.name: latest
field.caption: What is the latest time you could possibly leave?

field.name: volunteer
field.caption: Would you be willing to volunteer to help?

field.name: volunteer-how
field.caption: If Yes, how?

field.caption: Do you understand OO concepts?

field.caption: Do you apply OO methodology in your development?

field.caption: Would you like to learn more about OO?

field.name: catagory
field.caption: How would you categorize yourself?
field.option: Interested in learning Java from scratch

field.name: language
field.caption: What language do you currently use most?

field.name: programmer-months
field.caption: How many months have you been a programmer?

field.name: java-months
field.caption: How many months you been a java developer?

field.name: java-skill
field.caption: How would you describe your overall Java proficiency?

field.name: familar-list
field.caption: Choose all that you are familiar with

field.name: learn-list
field.caption: What would you like to learn more about?

field.caption: Do you use open source software?

field.caption: Have you contributed to any open software projects?

field.caption: What IDE (if any) do you use?

field.caption: What server software (if any) do you use?

field.name: os
field.caption: What OS do you use?

field.caption: What is your current position?

field.name: seeking
field.caption: Will you be/Are you actively seeking new employment as a Java developer?

field.name: available
field.caption: If yes, when will you be available?

field.name: hiring
field.caption: Are you actively looking to hire new Java employees?

field.name: hiring-type
field.caption: If yes, Permanent or contract?

field.name: contract-months
field.caption: If on contract, how many months?
